Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientCards

Class ClientExtraDep

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientCards.ClientLeaderCard
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientCards.ClientExtraDep
public class ClientExtraDep
extends ClientLeaderCard
The ClientLeaderCard that gives to the PlayerData an extra level in his warehouse. In that extra level the player can only place a single type of Resource.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientExtraDep

      public ClientExtraDep​(int victoryPoints, Resource required, Resource placeableRes, java.lang.String leaderID)
      Instantiates a new Extra deposit ClientLeaderCard.
      Parameters:
      victoryPoints - the victory points the ClientLeaderCard gives the PlayerData when played.
      required - the 5 required Resource the PlayerData has to own to play the ClientLeaderCard.
      placeableRes - the Resource which can be placed in this extra level.
      leaderID - the ClientLeaderCard's ID.

      Description copied from class: ClientLeaderCard
      Check if the ClientLeaderCard can be played by the player according to its requirements.
      Specified by:
      canBePlayed in class ClientLeaderCard
      Parameters:
      data - the PlayerData who wants to play the card.
      Returns:
